Container.Name: Pelagica
Container.Overview: An alternative, modern and configurable web frontend for Jellyfin built using React. Provides a fast, modern, and customizable user experience for browsing and watching your media library.
Container.Requires: Before starting, download the default config files from the GitHub repository and place them in the paths specified in the configuration. Download config.json from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KartoffelChipss/pelagica/main/config.json Download config.schema.json from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KartoffelChipss/pelagica/main/config.schema.json The config.json file controls the app's behavior and can be edited to set your default Jellyfin server address. Changes take effect immediately without restarting the container.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: The port for accessing the Pelagica web interface.

Config.Name: Config JSON
Config.Description: Path to the config.json file. Download the default from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KartoffelChipss/pelagica/main/config.json

Config.Name: Config Schema JSON
Config.Description: Path to the config.schema.json file. Download the default from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KartoffelChipss/pelagica/main/config.schema.json
